description: Equivalent to crook (“to bend”) +‎ -le (frequentative or diminutive suffix). Compare Dutch kreukelen, Low German krökeln.

verbs.description: crookle (third-person singular simple present crookles, present participle crookling, simple past and past participle crookled)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, dialectal, East Midlands, Lancashire, Yorkshire) To bend; to make crooked.
